GUARDIAN

Allied characters can use the Bastion for hard cover.

VETERAN

REINFORCED

The Veteran gains +1 Structure and +1 Stress.

VETERANCY

The Veteran gains +1 Accuracy on all checks and saves for one mech skill (chosen at creation): Hull, Agility, Systems, or Engineering.

VETERAN TRAITS

The Veteran gains one Veteran Trait per tier.

unstoppable

The Veteran’s standard moves ignore engagement and don’t provoke reactions.

SELF REPAIR

1/scene, as a Full Action, the Veteran regains all HP and clears all conditions.

BARRICADE

all terrain wheels

The Barricade ignores difficult terrain and dangerous terrain.

SHIP

MASSIVE SIZE

The Ship is Size 4. Though it is larger than most mechs, it is small by ship standards; larger ships are too heavily armored to be damaged by mech-scale weapons.

CREW

The Ship has at least two crewmembers.

TRANSPORT

The Ship can transport one Squad or characters whose combined Size is less than its own Size.

ARMORED HULL

The Ship gains +5 HP.

NO MANIPULATORS

The Ship can’t pick up objects, manipulate objects or the environment, or Grapple.
